title: [Health] Exploring the lived experiences of Suicide Attempt Survivors identifies three themes; 1) Mental Pain: grief, internal conflict “the world is better without me” 2) Social Challenges: lack of social connections & financial problems, and 3) Need for Love & Belonging: feeling understood, need of empathy
